help-file.title: BIOFEEDBACK
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <caster> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Psionic
This impressive mental discipline causes the atmosphere surrounding the caster to coalesce into a nearly solid vapor, making it extremely difficult to cause physical harm to the protected person. Like all forms of protection, the barrier can be worn down if repeatedly attacked enough.
